thread.title: Television Host Dan Abrams Lists West Village Condominium

author: Candace Taylor
title: Television Host Dan Abrams Lists West Village Condominium
text:
Dan Abrams, a television host, entrepreneur and a self-professed history buff, is listing his apartment in an 1830s-era Manhattan townhouse for $8.799 million.
“I always loved the fact that there was real history there,” he said. The founder of Abrams Media, which publishes the media and politics website Mediaite and others, Mr. Abrams also co-wrote a book on Abraham Lincoln.
